wikipedia_page.main: Ezekiel "Zeke" Johnston (1871 – 1942) was an Irish footballer who played in the Football League for Burnley and Stoke.

response: Sheldon was born in Stoke-upon-Trent and played for Stoke St.Peter's and then joined Stoke in the Football League. He was made back up 'keeper to Ezekiel Johnston and in two seasons with the club he played in eight matches. He left in May 1898 to play for Eccleshall.
